name: HyperCLOVA X (Local)
description: Run Naver HyperCLOVA X SEED models locally via a Python script.

settings.name: Model Path
settings.description: Absolute path to the downloaded HyperCLOVA X SEED model directory or Hugging Face model ID.

settings.name: Device
settings.description: Device to run the model on (e.g., 'cuda', 'cpu'). Defaults to 'cuda' if available, otherwise 'cpu'.
